mapper.select:
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtLstSetupDDao.selectPtLstSetupD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.LST_SETUP_META_ID, T.DFT_VA_YN, T.ATRB_ID, T.MSG_ID, T.WDTH_PERC, T.ALN_VA, T.SORT_OPT_VA, T.DATA_SORT_VA, T.DISP_YN, T.SORT_ORDR, T.MODR_UID, TO_CHAR(T.MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM PT_LST_SETUP_D T
AND T.LST_SETUP_META_ID = #{lstSetupMetaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.DFT_VA_YN = #{dftVaYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.ATRB_ID = #{atrbId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.LST_SETUP_META_ID, T.DFT_VA_YN, T.ATRB_ID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
